lecture.title: Before you start
lecture.author: Ali Heydari
lecture.content:
Hi all! Before I begin, I would like to thank you for your trust and kindness. Classes will be held online in Teams, and lessons are practical. The class link has been placed for participation. Please request through the link before the start of the class to open access for you.

Join Teams channel

It is recommended that you install the gate software according to the instructions given.
